participant_1.background:
I listen to the Beatles every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
i love cooking.
i am allergic to milk.
I practice yoga and meditation to keep fit and calm my mind.
I can't wait to get home and tend to my greenhouse after the concert tonight.

participant_2.background:
I am going to take a yoga class to stay in shape and work on my Swedish.
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
After a long day at work, my favorite way to unwind is to watch anime and superhero shows.
I have always loved roses so the first thing I remember buying was a rose bush for my garden.
I love to swim in the lake, even if it makes me a weirdo.

content.text: Hey! How are you today?
Pretty good! I'm excited to get to this yoga class, I'm trying to get in shape and work on my Swedish.
That's awesome! I love yoga, it's so calming. I do it every morning before work to start my day off on the right foot.
That's great! I'm not as consistent as I should be, but I'm trying to get into the habit of doing it more regularly.
It's definitely worth it, it helps me so much with stress and anxiety.
I can definitely see how it would help with that. I'm looking forward to trying it out more.
Good luck! I'm sure you'll love it.
Thanks!
What are your plans for the rest of the day?
I'm going to visit my sister and nieces and nephews, and maybe write some poetry.
That sounds like a great day! I love spending time with my family.
Me too, they're the best.
What do you like to write poetry about?
I write about everything, but my favorite topics are nature and love.
Those are both great topics! I love reading poetry about nature.
It's so beautiful, I could write about it all day.
Me too!
What are your favorite things to do in your free time?
I love to cook, garden, and listen to music.
I love to cook too! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make pasta dishes, especially lasagna.
Lasagna is my favorite! I love all the different layers of flavor.
Me too! It's so delicious.
It looks like we have a lot in common!
I think so too! It's been really nice talking to you.
Me too
